words.meaning: to fan off; an energetic cleanse or healing ceremony
words.context: Core ceremonial concept in Shipibo healing tradition
Energetic forces that can be cleared in payanti
Can be felt as symptoms like depression, addiction, illness
Person who performs payanti and healing ceremonies
Example of energy that can be expelled in one ceremony

words.meaning: owner; spirit in human form at the root of an energy
words.context: Every plant, disease, addiction, and material has an ibo; objective of healing is to see and expel it
Negative entity that can possess and control humans
Can control humans through bad habits, addictions, and diseases
Negative entities that protest when ayahuasca is given and are evicted by curandero

words.meaning: a spiritual machine or device invoked in icaros
words.context: Used by grandmother in icaros to evict negative entities
Invoked in healing icaros to frighten away negative entities
Used by healers to invoke spiritual power and evict negative entities
Person who evicts demons and facilitates patient rebirth
In Oni ceremony symbols can be seen that represent body conditions

words.meaning: Everything is with an owner, or everything contains an owner
